item.title: Visual Basic 6 project extension for Visual Studio
item.description: Iâ€™ve just published a new release of my Visual Studio extension that allows converting VB6 projects to a project that can be loaded and built in Visual Studio. Download Visual Basic 6X from the Visual Studio Gallery Project Homepage
